content: i made this scarf for a friend a long time ago but only recently had a chance to write up a pattern for it hope i didn t forget any details you can knit this project with any weight of yarn as long as you cast on more or less stitches depending on the thickness your yarn i hope you enjoy knitting this scarf it s a two-row pattern repeat and it looks exactly the same on both sides this pattern is also available in the serbian language
